jobDescription.html:
Job Highlights

  • Develop your career in innovation technology
  • One of the best technology firm in the market
  • Excellent team and talented colleagues

Job Description

You will be responsible for being aQuality Assurance Analyst who manages our top tier projects, with our award-winning team. On a day to day basis you will be required to get involved in every part of the project process to help our team reach the milestones and quality required. 

Responsibilities:

  • Review project requirements and related documentation such as sitemaps, wireframes, information architecture specifications & functional specifications.
  • Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases.
  • Execute the plan and manage all activities in the plan to ensure that all the project objectives are met and the solution works as expected.
  • Track and report the QA activities on a per project basis.
  • Work closely within the project team (PM and Developers) to identify, investigate, and resolve system problems and process issues.
  • Review project deliverables and artifacts from a testing perspective, and provide feedback, including actively participating in a test plan review with the team.
  • Analyze test results to ensure existing functionality and make appropriate recommendations.
  • Contribute to and monitor test planning, test preparation and scripting, and test execution according to established test standards and procedures.
  • Manage verification and validation activities for all production modifications.
  • Maintain document template libraries and internal project documentation related to testing, including releases and changes.
  • Work closely with development team to review issues or bug reports.
  • Participate and provide opinions on projects.


Requirement:

  • 2+ years’ experience in web application development with quality assurance/test experience
  • Sound knowledge of web project development
  • Knowledgeable in all processes and procedures utilized for quality assurance
  • Experience with different operating systems, common web browsers, HTML and CSS
  • Knowledge with Atlassian products Jira and Confluence
  • Proficient in quality assurance methodology, change management and communication skills
  • Proficiency in both spoken and written English and Chinese
  • Positive “can-do” attitude

Location

Hong Kong
